long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I love the website but I hate how it looks and how hard it is for me to find the stuff I need quickly, so I made a little plugin that changes the UI to a more minimalist, clean style. I made this for myself, but I'm sharing it here because why not :)

What it does: 
- replaces animated gifs with static images
- removes most images that are UI-Elements only
- replaces the font with a more modern one
- darkens the background image by ~50%
- removes background behind text
- highlights 'hacks', 'tools', 'forums' and 'main page' menu-items
- removes the logo at the top of the page.

Source code is availabe at https://github.com/ApexPredator13/smwcentral_beautifier
